content:

This is a traditional South African donut from a family recipe. It is a special treat that only comes out on very special occasions. The donuts are fried, dipped in a spiced sugar syrup, and then spirnkled with coconut flakes. Our bakery is about our family, and our breads reflect that.
Look for this very special treat!

content:
Attention all vegans and pan dulce lovers! Join us at [Black Cat CafÃ©] as we prepare for the Day of the Dead in style!
Sunday, October 8th and 29th
There will be traditional Mexican pan dulce, including the iconic Pan de Muerto, flavourful conchas, and adorable Marranitos. Perfect for pairing with your favourite coffee or ssatisfying your sweet tooth after a delightful meal.
Offered all day, so come by anytime to get your hands on these scrumptious treats.
We are excited to share our unique and delicious vegan pastries with you and look forward to seeing you at Black Cat!
Details of special promotions We are accepting preorders for collection on those special days. Otherwise, pop in and get it on the day!

title: Pop-up at Black Cat CafÃ©

content:
We are very happy to announce that two of our new products the iconic Pan de Muerto and the adorable Marranito, received this honour!
Louise Jane, CEO of The Vegan Choice Awards was kind to share the following words with about our products:
Pan de Muerto: If youâ€™re looking for something delectable to help you celebrate the Day of the Dead, Paâ€™l Sustoâ€™s Vegan Pan de Muerto is hard to beat. This mouthwatering bread will make your taste buds sing! Itâ€™s so much more than just a delicious treat. Itâ€™s an opportunity to connect with Mexican culture, especially when you learn all about the special tradition and history behind this irresistible, zesty, sugar-topped delight.
I loved the taste so much that this product has become a permanent part of my life, and I highly recommend checking this incredible company out if youâ€™re looking for a sweet connection to the spirit (and otherworldly deliciousness!!!)
Marranitos Iâ€™m a huge fan of all of the sweet offerings from Paâ€™l Susto, and these marranitos are no exception!
Like everything else from this brand, these are baked to absolute perfection. Theyâ€™re similar to gingerbread, but even tastier, and they have this incredible texture thatâ€™s somewhere between cake and a cookie. Iâ€™ve always thought of pigs as a symbol of luck, so these little piggies are a surefire way to spread good vibes.
Forget milk and cookies: Milk and marranitos are the way forward! If you havenâ€™t tried them before, these marranitos are really the best youâ€™ll find anywhere! And theyâ€™re completely Vegan!
summary: We are very happy to announce that two of our new products the iconic Pan de Muerto and the adorable Marranito, received this honour!
title: Vegan Pa'l Susto Awarded by Vegan Choice Award (again)!

content:
Attention all vegans and pan dulce lovers! Vegan Paâ€™l Susto is thrilled to announce our first-ever pop-up shop at Westfield Stratford! Join us on Sunday, 30th April, 2023 for a delicious day of vegan conchas and a new treat! Thatâ€™s right, for the first time ever, you can enjoy our award winning conchas directly from us.
We will be located outside H&M on the Ground Floor.
We have two special promos lined up. First, anyone will be able to pre-order their conchas at the standard price. And for our beloved customers, we have an exciting opportunity for you to try our newest product, the marranito, for free!
Scroll down to check the details of these promotions.
Donâ€™t miss out on this chance to indulge in some of the most delicious and unique mexican vegan pan dulce around.
We are excited to share our unique and delicious vegan pastries with you and look forward to seeing you at Westfield Stratford!
Details of special promotions We are offering a special promotion for preorders at our standard prices: Â£17.70 for 5 and Â£32.00 for 10 conchas, which means you can secure your delicious conchas ahead of time and avoid the queue on the day. Pre-orders close on Wednesday, 26th of April.
Additionally, we have an exclusive offer for our existing customers to taste our newest product, the marranito, completely free of charge when purchasing at the popup or via pre-order. To qualify for this promotion, you must be a current customer and provide proof of purchase.
summary: Come check our award winning vegan conchas and a new product.
title: Pop-up at Westfield Stratford

content:
We are very happy to announce that both of our classic flavours, vanilla and cacao, received this honour!
Louise Jane, CEO of The Vegan Choice Awards was kind to share the following words with about our product:
Vegans, rejoice!
There is now a Mexican home bakery in the UK that makes Vegan Conchas and they are a dream come true! If youâ€™ve never tried Conchas, then itâ€™s high time you did. And this company makes the best ones around. You can tell that their products are carefully crafted with the greatest of care, resulting in a big difference in quality between their baked goods, and those mass-produced and found in stores. The bread is soft and fluffy, with just the right amount of sweetness and the famous shell topping is baked to absolute perfection.
Theyâ€™re the perfect anytime treat, but they go especially well with a morning cup of coffee. They make great gifts, too, but once you taste them, you might not want to share! Be sure to follow them on Instagram for your chance to get in on the action! You wonâ€™t want to miss out on Concha Day! Both flavours are a must-try!
summary: We are very happy to announce that both of our classic flavours, vanilla and cacao, received this honour!
title: Vegan Pa'l Susto Awarded by Vegan Choice Award!
